Build ID: M20070212-1330

Steps To Reproduce:
Sorry but I do not know what I did to cause this bug to start happening. It just started happening after I restarted eclipse one day. The only thing I changed recently was the classpath setup of my projects.

I am running Eclipse on Ubuntu 7.04.
